nodes.text: A coma was a state of deep, prolonged unconsciousness resulting from disease or injury, from which a person could not be aroused. During the Clone Wars, the Jedi Master Depa Billaba fell into a coma after sustaining grave injuries at the Battle of Haruun Kal. During the rebellion on Akiva, Norra Wexley also fell into a coma after crashing in her starfighter. Finn entered a coma after sustaining lightsaber injuries from Kylo Ren during the Battle of Starkiller Base. He later awoke surrounded by a flexpoly bacta suit.
